dkupert.cipher

Class KeywordCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkupert.cipher.MonoAlphabeticCipher
      • dkupert.cipher.KeywordCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher

    public class KeywordCipher
extends MonoAlphabeticCipher
    Uses the parent class MonoAlphabeticCipher to encrypt and decrypt text using the KeywordCipher
    Version:
    2018-10-20
    Author:
    dkupert
